## 1. define  tools
### 1.1 DiceğŸ²

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.julia .cell-code}
emoji_dice1=["1ï¸âƒ£","2ï¸âƒ£","3ï¸âƒ£","4ï¸âƒ£","5ï¸âƒ£","6ï¸âƒ£"]
emoji_dice2=["1ï¸âƒ£","2ï¸âƒ£","3ï¸âƒ£","4ï¸âƒ£","5ï¸âƒ£","6ï¸âƒ£"]
```

```
[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.julia .cell-code}
using PrettyTables

matrix=[[i,j] for i in dice1, j in dice2]
display(matrix)
two_dice_space=vec(matrix)
two_dice_size=length(two_dice_space)
"two_dice_size"=>two_dice_size
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}

## 2.question 

### 2.1 ä¸¤ä¸ªéª°å­ä¹˜ç§¯ä¸º4
```julia
  cond(arr::Array,cond_number=4)=*(arr...)==cond_number
```

::: {.cell execution_count=3}
``` {.julia .cell-code}
cond1(arr::Array,cond_number=4)::Bool=*(arr...)==cond_number
res1=filter(arr->cond1(arr),two_dice_space)
show("ä¸¤ä¸ªéª°å­ä¹˜ç§¯ä¸º4"=>res1)
println("\n")
```
